meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slow or sluggish.
meanings.sent1: The pokiness of the turtle made it hard to keep up with the rabbit.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the pokiness of this old computer; it takes forever to load.
meanings.sent3: The pokiness of the sloth was actually quite endearing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The pokiness of the traffic resembled a never-ending line of ants on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The pokiness of the snail's pace left a lasting impression on the observer.

meanings.definition: A feeling of discomfort or unease.
meanings.sent1: The pokiness in the room grew as the awkward silence lingered.
meanings.sent2: Her pokiness about the upcoming test was evident in her fidgeting.
meanings.sent3: The pokiness of the situation made everyone shift uncomfortably in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The pokiness in the air was palpable, creating a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The pokiness of the unknown filled her with a sense of unease.
